Heading: Front cover
Note: 2D

Heading: Back cover
Note: 2D

Heading: Cover / pack
Note: Not limited to front or back, including 3D perspective

Heading: Contributor picture
Note: Photograph or portrait of contributor(s)

Heading: Contributor presentation
Note: Contributor presentation and/or commentary

Heading: Contributor event schedule
Note: Link to a schedule in iCalendar format

Heading: Sample content
Note: For example: a short excerpt, sample text or a complete sample chapter, page images, screenshots etc

Heading: Widget
Note: A ‘look inside’ feature presented as a small embeddable application

Heading: Review
Note: Review text held in a separate downloadable file, not in the ONIX record. Equivalent of code 06 in List 153. Use the <TextContent> composite for review quotes carried in the ONIX record. Use the <CitedContent> composite for a third-party review which is referenced from the ONIX record. Use <SupportingResource> for review text offered as a separate file resource for reproduction as part of promotional material for the product

Heading: Teacher’s guide
Note: Incuding associated teacher / instructor resources

Heading: Feature article
Note: Feature article provided by publisher

Heading: Character ‘interview’
Note: Fictional character ‘interview’

Heading: Table of contents
Note: A table of contents held in a separate downloadable file, not in the ONIX record. Equivalent of code 04 in List 153. Use the <TextContent> composite for a table of contents carried in the ONIX record. Use <Supporting Resource> for text offered as a separate file resource

Heading: Trailer
Note: A promotional video (or audio), similar to a movie trailer (sometimes referred to as a ‘book trailer’)

Heading: Cover thumbnail
Note: Intended ONLY for transitional use, where ONIX 2.1 records referencing existing thumbnail assets of unknown pixel size are being re-expressed in ONIX 3.0. Use code 01 for all new cover assets, and where the pixel size of older assets is known

Heading: Full content
Note: The full content of the product (or the product itself), supplied for example to support full-text search or indexing

Heading: Full cover
Note: Includes cover, back cover, spine and – where appropriate – any flaps

Heading: Description
Note: Descriptive text in a separate downloadable file, not in the ONIX record. Equivalent of code 03 in List 153. Use the <TextContent> composite for descriptions carried in the ONIX record. Use <Supporting Resource> for text offered as a separate file resource for reproduction as part of promotional material for the product

Heading: Index
Note: Index text held in a separate downloadable file, not in the ONIX record. Equivalent of code 15 in List 153. Use the <TextContent> composite for index text carried in the ONIX record. Use <Supporting Resource> for an index offered as a separate file resource

Heading: Student’s guide
Note: Including associated student / learner resources

Heading: Publisher’s catalogue
Note: For example a PDF or other digital representation of a publisher’s ‘new titles’ or range catalogue

Heading: Online advertisement panel
Note: For example a banner ad for the product. Pixel dimensions should typically be included in <ResourceVersionFeature>

Heading: Online advertisement page
Note: German ‘Búhnenbild’

Heading: Promotional event material
Note: For example, posters, logos, banners, advertising templates for use in connection with a promotional event

Heading: Digital review copy
Note: Availability of a digital review or digital proof copy, may be limited to authorised users or account holders

Heading: Instructional material
Note: For example, video showing how to use the product

Heading: Introduction
Note: Introduction, preface or other preliminary material in a separate resource file

Heading: Collection description
Note: Descriptive material in a separate resource file, not in the ONIX record. Equivalent of code 17 in List 153. Use the <TextContent> composite for collection descriptions carried in the ONIX record. Use <Supporting Resource> for material (which need not be solely only) offered as a separate file resource for reproduction as part of promotional material for the product and collection

Heading: Bibliography
Note: Complete list of books by the author(s), supplied as a separate resource file

Heading: Abstract
Note: Formal summary of content (normally used with academic and scholarly content only)

Heading: Cover holding image
Note: Image that may be used for promotional purposes in place of a front cover, ONLY where the front cover itself cannot be provided or used for any reason. Typically, holding images may comprise logos, artwork or an unfinished front cover image. Senders should ensure removal of the holding image from the record as soon as a cover image is available. Recipients must ensure replacement of the holding image with the cover image when it is supplied

Heading: License
Note: Link to a license covering permitted usage of the product content. Deprecated in favor of <EpubLicense>. This was a temporary workaround in ONIX 3.0, and use of <EpubLicense> is strongly preferred
